right_to_refuse.text: I, ______________________________________________ have been informed by the treating dentist and hygienist that I have periodontal disease. I understand that without a periodontal scaling and root planing my condition will not improve and could possibly worsen, causing potential tooth and bone loss. I am declining the option to have the periodontal cleaning done, thereby relieving (Health Center) and any of the providers of any liability, should these conditions develop. Patient Signature: __________________________________ Date: ___________________ Provider Signature: _________________________________ Date: ___________________ Witness: _________________________________________ Date:___________________
